01. About Me

Hi there, this is my why...

Former Assistant Nurse in Aged Care - Turned Web / App Developer

For the past 4 years I have been working within an Aged Care facility, helping residents of varying levels of physical and mental abilities make the best of the years they have left, however I have always felt I could do more to just not within the confines of the facility.

â€¦Did the soul work to identify my next step, and took it.

As a young fella, I always said I wanted to get into game development, yet the more I looked into the industry the more I realised it really wasnt for me. I was helping a Registered Nurse change dressings on a resident, they had a large wound known as pressure sore it was stage 4 (Really really bad). Now the reason I tell you this is the reason for my career change, I had an idea that day for an application that would not only aid in preventing deteriation of wounds, it would also allow nurses and doctors to treat the patients faster.

Now i understand that not everyone can make the next Uber, however that day that I knew as a developer I can make a difference.
